verses.verse: "At that time <S%H6256><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'Cut <S%H6458><s%> out for yourself two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like the former <S%H7223><s%> ones, <S%H7223><s%> and come <S%H5927><s%> up to Me on the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> for yourself.

'And I will write <S%H3789><s%> on the tablets <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that were on the former <S%H7223><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shattered, <S%H7665><s%> and you shall put <S%H7760><s%> them in the ark. <S%H727><s%>'

"So I made <S%H6213><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and cut <S%H6458><s%> out two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like the former <S%H7223><s%> ones, <S%H7223><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> with the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> in my hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"And He wrote <S%H3789><s%> on the tablets, <S%H3871><s%> like the former <S%H7223><s%> writing, <S%H4385><s%> the Ten <S%H6235><s%> Commandments <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly; <S%H6951><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them to me.

"Then I turned <S%H6437><s%> and came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the tablets <S%H3871><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had made; <S%H6213><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they are, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> me."

(Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out from Beeroth <S%H885><s%> Bene-jaakan to Moserah. <S%H4149><s%> There <S%H8033><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> he was buried <S%H6912><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> ministered <S%H3547><s%> as priest <S%H3547><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>

From there <S%H8033><s%> they set <S%H5265><s%> out to Gudgodah; <S%H1412><s%> and from Gudgodah <S%H1412><s%> to Jotbathah, <S%H3193><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%>

At that time <S%H6256><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> set <S%H914><s%> apart <S%H914><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to serve <S%H8334><s%> Him and to bless <S%H1288><s%> in His name <S%H8034><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Therefore, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> Levi <S%H3878><s%> does not have <S%H1961><s%> a portion <S%H2506><s%> or inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with his brothers; <S%H251><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him.)

"I, moreover, stayed <S%H5975><s%> on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%> like the first <S%H7223><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to me that time <S%H6471><s%> also; <S%H1571><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was not willing <S%H14><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> you.

"Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'Arise, <S%H6965><s%> proceed <S%H1980><s%> on your journey <S%H4550><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> that they may go <S%H935><s%> in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers to give <S%H1><s%> them.'

"And now, <S%H6258><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> does the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> require <S%H7592><s%> from you, but to fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> His ways <S%H1870><s%> and love <S%H157><s%> Him, and to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul, <S%H5315><s%>
[and] to keep <S%H8104><s%> the Lord's commandments <S%H4687><s%> and His statutes <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today <S%H3117><s%> for your good <S%H9185><s%>?

"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> belong heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the highest <S%H8064><s%> heavens, <S%H8064><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is in it.

"Yet <S%H7534><s%> on your fathers did the Lord <S%H1><s%> set <S%H3068><s%> His affection <S%H2836><s%> to love <S%H2836><s%> them, and He chose <S%H157><s%> their descendants <S%H977><s%> after <S%H2233><s%> them, [even] you above <S%H310><s%> all <S%H4480><s%> peoples, <S%H3605><s%> as [it is] this <S%H5971><s%> day. <S%H2088><s%>
"Circumcise <S%H4135><s%> then your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and stiffen <S%H7185><s%> your neck <S%H6203><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%>

"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is the God <S%H430><s%> of gods <S%H430><s%> and the Lord <S%H136><s%> of lords, <S%H113><s%> the great, <S%H1419><s%> the mighty, <S%H1368><s%> and the awesome <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H410><s%> who <S%H834><s%> does not show <S%H5375><s%> partiality, <S%H5375><s%> <S%H6440><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a bribe. <S%H7810><s%>

"He executes <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> for the orphan <S%H3490><s%> and the widow, <S%H490><s%> and shows <S%H157><s%> His love <S%H157><s%> for the alien <S%H1616><s%> by giving <S%H5414><s%> him food <S%H3899><s%> and clothing. <S%H8071><s%>
"So show <S%H157><s%> your love <S%H157><s%> for the alien, <S%H1616><s%> for you were aliens <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"You shall fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> Him and cling <S%H1692><s%> to Him, and you shall swear <S%H7650><s%> by His name. <S%H8034><s%>

"He is your praise <S%H8416><s%> and He is your God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and awesome <S%H3372><s%> things <S%H3372><s%> for you which <S%H834><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen. <S%H7200><s%>

"Your fathers went <S%H1><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt <S%H3381><s%> seventy <S%H4714><s%> persons <S%H7657><s%> [in all,] and now <S%H5315><s%> the Lord <S%H6258><s%> your God <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H430><s%> you as numerous <S%H7760><s%> as the stars <S%H7230><s%> of heaven. <S%H3556><s%>
